A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I cannot believe all the audience hate on this movie. I am a fan of the series and this movie expands the mythology. Each character has character arcs that are compelling. There is a sense that the film makers were deconstructing the Lucas-Verse and rebuilding the Star Wars world that clearly speaks to today’s culture. Outside of Han Solo\, the Star Wars characterization has never been as on the nose as the characters we have in this new batch of films. Strongest of recommends!
